Translations.Text: aparadhigalu tam'ma odeyana munde talebagi, ‘‘nam'modeya! Navu ellavannu nodikondevu mattu kelikondevu. Nam'manniga (bhumige) maralisu. Navu satkarmagalannu maduvevu. Naviga drdhanambike ullavaragiddeve’’ endu heluvudannu nivu noduvantiddare cennagittu

navu bayasiddare pratiyobbarigu neramargavannu anusarisuva bhagyavannu nidi biduttiddevu. Adare, ‘‘khandita nanu narakavannu, manavaru hagu jinn‌galinda tumbi bidaliddene’’ emba nanna matu nijavagi bittide
nivu i dinada bhetiyannu maretu bittiddara phalavannu idiga anubhavisiri. Navu nim'mannu khandita maretiruvevu. Nivu maduttidda karmagala phalavagi, sasvatavada sikseyannu anubhavisiri
nam'ma vacanagalannu nambuvavaru enthavarendare, avarige avugalannu nenapisidodane avaru sastangaveragi biduttare hagu tam'ma odeyana pavitravannu kondaduttare mattu avaru ahankara toruvudilla
avara bennugalu avara capegalinda duraviruttave. Avaru bhaya hagu nirikseyondige tam'ma odeyanannu prarthisuttaliruttare mattu navu avarige nidiruvudannu avaru kharcu maduttare
Avara karmagala phalavagi, avara kannugalu tampagalu, avarigagi enannu guptavagi sid'dhagolisidalagide embudu, yarigu tiliyadu
visvasiyagiruvavanu duskarmiyantagalu sadhyave? Avaru khandita samanaralla
visvasigalagiddu satkarmagalannu maduttiddavarigagi, avaru maduttidda karmagalige pratiphalavagi, sasvatavada bhavyatotagalalliruva nivasagalive

innu avidheyaragiddavara palige narakave neleyagiruvudu. Avaru adarinda horahogalu bayasidagalella avarannu matte adarolakke maralisi bidalaguvudu mattu avarodane, ‘‘nivu nirakarisuttidda narakada sikseyannu saviyiri’’ ennalaguvudu
navu (paralokada) dodda siksege munna avarige (ihalokadalli) sanna siksegala savi kanisuvevu – avaru (saridarige) maralabahudendu
tanna odeyana vacanagala mulaka upadesisalpatta balikavu adannu kadeganisi bittavaniginta dodda akrami yariddane? Khanditavagiyu navu aparadhigala virud'dha pratikara tirisuvevu

navu i hinde musarige, granthavannu nididdevu. Avanannu (allahanannu) bhetiyagaliruva kuritu nivu sansaya talabedi (endu adaralli upadesisalagittu). Navu adannu (a granthavannu) bani isra'ilara santatigalige margadarsiyagisiddevu
avaru sahanasilaragiddaga, navu avaralli kelavarannu nayakaragisiddevu. Avaru nam'ma adesadante janarige margadarsigalagiddaru mattu nam'ma vacanagalalli acala visvasa ullavaragiddaru
nim'ma odeyanu, avaru paraspara bhinnate talidda ella visayagalannu punarut'thana dina khandita ityarthagolisuvanu

navu avariginta hindina adesto samudayagalannu nasa madiruvudu, avara palige margadarsiyagalillave? Avara (hinde nasagondavara) nelegalalli avaru nadedaduttare. Idaralli khandita puravegalive. Avarenu keluttillave

Avaru nodalillave, navu onagida nelada kadege nirannu harisuvudannu? Adarinda navu beleyannu horategeyutteve. Adannu avara januvarugalu tinnuttave mattu svatah avaru tinnuttare. Avarenu (idannella) noduttillave
nivu satyavantaragiddare, tirpina a dina yavaga banditu(endu tilisiri) endu avaru heluttare
heliri; tirpina a dina, dhikkarigalige avara nambikeyinda yava labhavu agadu mattu avarige heccina kalavakasavu sigadu
(dutare,) nivu avarannu kadeganisiri mattu kayiri. Avaru khandita kayuttiddare
dutare, allahanige anjiri mattu dhikkarigalannu hagu kapatigalannu anusarisabedi. Allahanu khandita ellavannu balla yuktivantanagiddane
